mapper.select: select r.r_no, r.p_no, r.m_no, m.m_id, r.r_content, r.r_recommend, r.r_report from reply r inner join member m on r.m_no = m.m_no where p_no = #{pNo} order by r.r_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from reply where r_no = #{rNo} and p_no = #{pNo} and m_no = #{mNo}
mapper.update: update reply set r_recommend = r_recommend + 1 where r_no = #{rNo}
update reply set r_report = r_report + 1 where r_no = #{rNo}
mapper.insert: insert into friend (f_pk, m_no, f_no) values (friend_no_seq.nextval, #{mNo}, #{fNo})
